page.title: 17Kirk Session.Woman's Guild.
page.content: The church of{St.Mary, Auchterhouse}is within the Presbytery of Dundee. It is managed locally by the{Kirk Session} which is as follows:- Minister {Rev. Mrs H.Johnstone Session Clerk {Miss E.Adams} Treasurer {Mr G.Stewart} Elders {Mrs A.Murray, Mr F.Drurie, {Mr A.Clark, Mr W.Clark, Mr A.Grewar, {Mr I.Murray, Mr J.Wilson, Mr G.Savage, {Mr R.Campbell, Mr R.McLeod, Mrs {M.Floyd } Organist {Mrs M.Floyd.} The{Woman's Guild}is a social body of the lady members of the church.The committee is as follows:- President { Mrs S.Clark Vice President{Mrs M.Floyd Secretary { Mrs M.Grundison Treasurer {Mrs T.Hudson Committee {Mrs H.Allison, Mrs J.Black, {Mrs S.Milne.
